attributes.additional_details:
From MP’s to Lord Mayor and the deputy prime minister and prime minister we elected them to these posts we should also have the right to deselected them also.

I’ll not bore you with too much details but I feel if they make a promise to you to get your vote then we should have the right to take it back.

All i'm asking of our Government is the right to take our vote back or an online voting poll system to sack a representative.
